title: Bug 117415Focus is lost when publishing a template to a folder
description: Description: Focus is lost when publishing a template to a folder.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: Bug 117415Focus is lost when publishing a template to a folder "Publish to template folder" dialog pops up and no cursor is focused on.
SR: Bug 117415Focus is lost when publishing a template to a folder After creating a template file, Select FilePublish to template folder.2.
